title: APBn member found hanging at Ctg flat
body: A member of the Armed Police Battalion was found hanging at his rented flat in Chattogram cityâ€™s Bayezid Bostami police station area on Monday night. The deceased was Naeem Biswas, 25, a member of Armed Police Battalion-9. He had been serving in the battalion for about one and a half years and was living with his family in that flat. His hailed from Bakerganj upazila of Barishal district, according to APBn. APBn-9 additional superintendent of police Dipak Jyoti Khisa said that Naeem was found hanging from a scarf at about 8:00pm. He was taken to the emergency department of Chittagong Medical College Hospital, where on-duty doctors declared him dead. The Police are investigating how the incident took place.
